title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When right-clicking on a field in TH (klass in this case) and selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, no action is performed.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc' option in the context menu should add Javadoc to the selected field (klass in this case).
SR:
1. Open the TH (klass) file.
2. Right-click on a field (e.g., klass) in the TH file.
3. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu.
4. Verify that Javadoc is added to the selected field.
